user.title: Setup Fritz!Box Tools
user.description:
Setup Fritz!Box Tools to control your Fritz!Box.
Minimum needed: username, password.
Documentation: https://github.com/mammuth/ha-fritzbox-tools

data.homeassistant_ip: Port forwardings: IP of homeassistant device
data.devices: Device profiles: comma seperated list of devices

error.connection_error: Failed to connect to Fritz!Box. Check your username and password.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration of Fritz!Box Tools is allowed.
